div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 06:54 am CDT

div.span: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 2pm, then a slight chance of showers between 2pm and 4pm. Cloudy, with a high near 67. North northeast wind 7 to 12 mph increasing to 13 to 18 mph in the afternoon. Chance of precipitation is 40%.
Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming clear, with a low around 43. North wind 6 to 13 mph becoming west after midnight.
Increasing clouds, with a high near 77. West wind 8 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.
